medium: Watercolor with traces of graphite on card
title: Scandinavian Peasant Woman in an Interior
description: young woman in profile with head turned to PL, seated in a side chair; woman wears long brown skirt, white apron and blouse, starched white bonnet, and orange and brown vest; window behind woman\'s head
creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
